items.sentence: Is it true illegal immigrants are taking jobs away from citizens who want them?
Tom didn't like his office, so he asked his boss to let him use another office.
Tom saw Mary eating meat, even though she'd told him that she was a vegetarian.
I don't want to join the kind of a club that accepts people like me as members.
It was too late to help Tom. All the doctor could do was to pronounce him dead.
